p:
Some outbreaks and YF cases in non-epidemic areas have been reported. Since 2015, Brazil has faced significant sylvatic yellow fever outbreaks in the four States of the Southeast region, mainly due the insufficient vaccination coverage, since these States are not YF epidemic areas
22 , 23 . In addition, by the end of the 20 th century, the YF virus has spread to the Atlantic forest regions (Southeast and South of Brazil) increasing the number of infected primates and humans
24 .
